command.text: select "CarTrip"."CarTripID" "CarTripID" ,"CarTrip"."sgm" "sgm" ,"sgm"."sgm_Nm" "sgmsgm_Nm" ,"sgmOpco"."OpcoName" "sgmOpcoOpcoName" ,"CarTrip"."car_no" "car_no" ,"car_"."PLAT_No" "car_EMP_Emp_no1Emp_NOt" ,"car_caseoperationdesc"."caseoperationdesc" "car_caseoperationdesccaseoperationdesc" ,"car_carclass"."carclassname" "car_carclasscarclassname" ,"car_Insu_Cmp"."Insu_Cmpname" "car_Insu_CmpInsu_Cmpname" ,"car_Insu_Cmp1"."Insu_Cmpname" "car_Insu_Cmp1Insu_Cmpname" ,"car_Insu_Cmp2"."Insu_Cmpname" "car_Insu_Cmp2Insu_Cmpname" ,"car_kind"."carkinddesc" "car_kindcarkinddesc" ,"car_Cstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEF1_name" "car_Cstm_TSNEFNO1TSNEF1_name" ,"car_Cstm_Slm_"."Slm_Nm" "car_Cstm_Slm_Slm_Nm" ,"car_Sup_"."Sup_Nm" "car_Sup_Sup_Nm" ,"car_Sup_Acc_"."Acc_Nm" "car_Sup_Acc_Acc_Nm" ,"car_Sup_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "car_Sup_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"car_Sup_Curncy_"."Curncy_Nm" "car_Sup_Curncy_Curncy_Nm" ,"car_Tamweelreq"."Tamweeldeatails" "car_TamweelreqTamweeldeatails" "car_Tamweelreqtasedwaytasedwayname" ,"CarTrip"."Emp_No" "Emp_No" ,"Emp_"."Emp_Nmdriver" "Emp_Emp_Nmdriver" ,"Emp_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Emp_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Emp_sgmOpco"."OpcoName" "Emp_sgmOpcoOpcoName" ,"Emp_Emp_no1"."Emp_NOt" "Emp_Emp_no1Emp_NOt" ,"Emp_Emp_no1sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Emp_Emp_no1sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1salrycat"."grade_desc_a" "Emp_Emp_no1salrycatgrade_desc_a" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Blood_Type"."ModifiedBy" "Emp_Emp_no1Blood_TypeModifiedBy" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Bnk_"."Bnk_Acc" "Emp_Emp_no1Bnk_Bnk_Acc" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_Acc" "Emp_Emp_no1Sub_BnkBnk_Acc" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Emp_Emp_no1Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Depm_"."Depm_Nm" "Emp_Emp_no1Depm_Depm_Nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Educt_Type"."Educt_Nm" "Emp_Emp_no1Educt_TypeEduct_Nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Job_Stu"."Emp_Stunm" "Emp_Emp_no1Job_StuEmp_Stunm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Earning_"."Earning_Nm" "Emp_Emp_no1Earning_Earning_Nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Gender"."Gender" "Emp_Emp_no1GenderGender" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Job_"."Job_Nm" "Emp_Emp_no1Job_Job_Nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Loc_"."Loc_Nm" "Emp_Emp_no1Loc_Loc_Nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Ownr_"."Ownr_ID" "Emp_Emp_no1Ownr_Ownr_ID" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Reljan"."Reljan_nm" "Emp_Emp_no1ReljanReljan_nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1Status_Type"."Status_Nm" "Emp_Emp_no1Status_TypeStatus_Nm" ,"Emp_Emp_no1branch"."Desc1" "Emp_Emp_no1branchDesc1" ,"CarTrip"."kmReading" "kmReading" ,"CarTrip"."Fuel" "Fuel" ,"Fuel"."Fuellevelname" "FuelFuellevelname" ,"CarTrip"."StartDate" "StartDate" ,"CarTrip"."StartTime" "StartTime" ,"CarTrip"."EndDate" "EndDate" ,"CarTrip"."Endtime" "Endtime" ,"CarTrip"."cntstcode" "cntstcode" ,"cntst"."status_name" "cntststatus_name" ,"CarTrip"."Notes" "Notes" ,"CarTrip"."RTsgm" "RTsgm" ,"CarTrip"."RtFuel" "RtFuel" ,"RtFuel"."Fuellevelname" "RtFuelFuellevelname" ,"CarTrip"."RtkmReading" "RtkmReading" ,"CarTrip"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"CarTrip"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"CarTrip"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"CarTrip"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" ,"CarTrip"."TripKindid" "TripKindid" ,"TripKind"."TripKindDesc" "TripKindTripKindDesc" ,"CarTrip"."Tripflag" "Tripflag" ,"CarTrip"."ModifiedByUserId" "ModifiedByUserId" ,"CarTrip"."CreatedById" "CreatedById" from "dbo"."CarTrip" "CarTrip" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "sgm" on "CarTrip"."sgm" = "sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "sgmOpco" on "sgm"."OpcoID" = "sgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."CarInfom" "car_" on "CarTrip"."car_no" = "car_"."Car_No" left join "dbo"."CaCrstyl" "car_Car_Type" on "car_"."Car_Type" = "car_Car_Type"."Styl_No" left join "dbo"."Cadriver" "car_EMP_" on "car_"."EMP_NO" = "car_EMP_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "car_EMP_sgm" on "car_EMP_"."sgm" = "car_EMP_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "car_EMP_Emp_no1" on "car_EMP_"."Emp_no1" = "car_EMP_Emp_no1"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."carcaseoperationdesc" "car_caseoperationdesc" on "car_"."caseoperationdescid" = "car_caseoperationdesc"."caseoperationdescid" left join "dbo"."carclass" "car_carclass" on "car_"."carclass" = "car_carclass"."carclass" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "car_Insu_Cmp" on "car_"."Insu_Cmp" = "car_Insu_Cmp"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "car_Insu_Cmp1" on "car_"."Insu_Cmp1" = "car_Insu_Cmp1"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "car_Insu_Cmp2" on "car_"."Insu_Cmp2" = "car_Insu_Cmp2"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carkindlist" "car_kind" on "car_"."kind" = "car_kind"."carkindid" left join "dbo"."CaCrstyl" "car_kindStyl_" on "car_kind"."Styl_No" = "car_kindStyl_"."Styl_No" left join "dbo"."carstutuslist" "car_carstutus_" on "car_"."carstutus_no" = "car_carstutus_"."carstutus_no" left join "dbo"."Colorlist" "car_Car_Colr" on "car_"."Car_Colr" = "car_Car_Colr"."ColorNo" left join "dbo"."FuellevelDisplay" "car_fuelllevel" on "car_"."fuelllevel" = "car_fuelllevel"."FuellevelDisplayid" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "car_sgm" on "car_"."sgm" = "car_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "car_sgmOpco" on "car_sgm"."OpcoID" = "car_sgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."Guaranteelist" "car_Guarantee" on "car_"."Guarantee" = "car_Guarantee"."Guarantee" left join "dbo"."Insurancetype" "car_Insurance_type" on "car_"."Insurance_type" = "car_Insurance_type"."Insurance_type" left join "dbo"."Likelist" "car_Car_Lik" on "car_"."Car_Lik" = "car_Car_Lik"."LikeNo" left join "dbo"."padnaturewaylist" "car_padnatureway" on "car_"."padnaturewayid" = "car_padnatureway"."padnaturewayid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "car_Fbrct_Cntry" on "car_"."Fbrct_Cntry" = "car_Fbrct_Cntry"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "car_Ownr_" on "car_"."Ownr_No" = "car_Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."Pycnstnt" "car_Ownr_cmp_" on "car_Ownr_"."cmp_no" = "car_Ownr_cmp_"."Cmp_No" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "car_Cstm_" on "car_"."Cstm_No" = "car_Cstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."AreaList" "car_Cstm_Area" on "car_Cstm_"."AreaNo" = "car_Cstm_Area"."AreaNo" left join "dbo"."EvaluationList" "car_Cstm_Evaluation" on "car_Cstm_"."EvaluationNO" = "car_Cstm_Evaluation"."EvaluationNO" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "car_Cstm_acc_" on "car_Cstm_"."acc_no" = "car_Cstm_acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "car_Cstm_Cntry_" on "car_Cstm_"."Cntry_No" = "car_Cstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "car_Cstm_curncy_" on "car_Cstm_"."curncy_no" = "car_Cstm_curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef" "car_Cstm_TSNEF" on "car_Cstm_"."TSNEFNO" = "car_Cstm_TSNEF"."TSNEFNO" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef1" "car_Cstm_TSNEFNO1" on "car_Cstm_"."TSNEFNO1" = "car_Cstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEFNO1" left join "dbo"."Stslsman" "car_Cstm_Slm_" on "car_Cstm_"."Slm_No" = "car_Cstm_Slm_"."Slm_No" left join "dbo"."Stsuplir" "car_Sup_" on "car_"."Sup_No" = "car_Sup_"."Sup_No" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "car_Sup_Acc_" on "car_Sup_"."Acc_No" = "car_Sup_Acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "car_Sup_Cntry_" on "car_Sup_"."Cntry_No" = "car_Sup_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "car_Sup_Curncy_" on "car_Sup_"."Curncy_No" = "car_Sup_Curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."Tamweelrequest" "car_Tamweelreq" on "car_"."Tamweelreqid" = "car_Tamweelreq"."Tamweelreqid" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "car_TamweelreqCurncy_" on "car_Tamweelreq"."Curncy_No" = "car_TamweelreqCurncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "car_TamweelreqCstm_" on "car_Tamweelreq"."Cstm_No" = "car_TamweelreqCstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."tasedwaylist" "car_Tamweelreqtasedway" on "car_Tamweelreq"."tasedwayid" = "car_Tamweelreqtasedway"."tasedwayid" left join "dbo"."Cadriver" "Emp_" on "CarTrip"."Emp_No" = "Emp_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Emp_sgm" on "Emp_"."sgm" = "Emp_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "Emp_sgmOpco" on "Emp_sgm"."OpcoID" = "Emp_sgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "Emp_Emp_no1" on "Emp_"."Emp_no1" = "Emp_Emp_no1"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Emp_Emp_no1sgm" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."sgm" = "Emp_Emp_no1sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."grade" "Emp_Emp_no1salrycat" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."salrycat" = "Emp_Emp_no1salrycat"."grade_code" left join "dbo"."pyBlood" "Emp_Emp_no1Blood_Type" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Blood_Type" = "Emp_Emp_no1Blood_Type"."Blood_Type" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "Emp_Emp_no1Bnk_" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Bnk_No" = "Emp_Emp_no1Bnk_"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "Emp_Emp_no1Sub_Bnk" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Sub_Bnk" = "Emp_Emp_no1Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Emp_Emp_no1Cntry_" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Cntry_No" = "Emp_Emp_no1Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pydepm" "Emp_Emp_no1Depm_" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Depm_No" = "Emp_Emp_no1Depm_"."Depm_No" left join "dbo"."PyempEdu" "Emp_Emp_no1Educt_Type" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Educt_Type" = "Emp_Emp_no1Educt_Type"."Educt_Type" left join "dbo"."Pyempstu" "Emp_Emp_no1Job_Stu" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Job_Stu" = "Emp_Emp_no1Job_Stu"."Emp_stu" left join "dbo"."Pyerntsalyp1" "Emp_Emp_no1Earning_" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Earning_no" = "Emp_Emp_no1Earning_"."Earning_No" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "Emp_Emp_no1Gender" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Genderid" = "Emp_Emp_no1Gender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."Pyjobs" "Emp_Emp_no1Job_" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Job_No" = "Emp_Emp_no1Job_"."Job_No" left join "dbo"."PyLocation" "Emp_Emp_no1Loc_" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Loc_No" = "Emp_Emp_no1Loc_"."loc_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "Emp_Emp_no1Ownr_" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Ownr_No" = "Emp_Emp_no1Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "Emp_Emp_no1Reljan" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Reljan" = "Emp_Emp_no1Reljan"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyStatus" "Emp_Emp_no1Status_Type" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."Status_Type" = "Emp_Emp_no1Status_Type"."Status_Type" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Emp_Emp_no1branch" on "Emp_Emp_no1"."branch" = "Emp_Emp_no1branch"."branch" left join "dbo"."Fuellevel" "Fuel" on "CarTrip"."Fuel" = "Fuel"."Fuellevelid" left join "dbo"."contractstatus" "cntst" on "CarTrip"."cntstcode" = "cntst"."cntstcode" left join "dbo"."Fuellevel" "RtFuel" on "CarTrip"."RtFuel" = "RtFuel"."Fuellevelid" left join "dbo"."TripKindlist" "TripKind" on "CarTrip"."TripKindid" = "TripKind"."TripKindid"
